Posts.Content: emilymcq wrote: Hi Everyone:  I've had 2 normal ultrasounds and one normal mamogram.  My left breast is itchy and today I noticed a dent that looke like a pock mark.  There is only the 1.  I'm freaking out.  I am 7 months pregnant and have an 18 month old.  I've seen a breast surgeon and he said the itchy feeling is most likely from pregnancy.  I examine my breasts probably every day because I'm so scared and I know this pit mark is new.  I also have discharge from both nipples when I squeeze.  However that has been there almost 3 years and was tested to be normal. Has anyone experienced just 1 pit mark (almost like a single acne pock mark).  Thank you! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Pitting? emilymcq Jalmom09

Posts.Content: Apr 11, 2010 12:32PM emilymcq wrote: Thank you for your reply!  Is a skin punch biopsy something that is done in the dr. office?  I have a follow up  appointment from my ultrasound scheduled already for the 19th with the breast surgical oncologist that my OB originally reffered me to. Thank you so much.
Posts.Title: Pitting? emilymcq Jalmom09
